abstractContent.text: Word Sense Disambiguation (WSD) aims at determining the appropriate sense of a word in a particular context.
This is a very important area, especially to provide resources to other areas of Natural Language Processing.
Many applications are engaged in the multidocument context, where the processing is performed on a set of texts, however, there are no reports of applications and experiments of WSD in this context.
In this paper, we present two methods of WSD, a single and another multi document, motivated by evidence of corpus.
The methods were designed to Portuguese language and compared with other works for the language, and stood higher in their respective fields.
